name: The Angriest Man Alive
description:
Another very short, interactive story, this time for Trijam #157 (Theme: The angriest protagonist). This time, there is even some actual gameplay!

There are three endings altogether. Can you find them all?

Controls
----------

Move / Select Options Arrow Keys or Left ClickInteractSpace, Enter or Left ClickCancelESC or Right ClickMove faster/slowerHold Shift (for web version, please go to options and set to 'always Dash')

Content warning: Some pixelated blood, violence and deaths. Nothing too extreme though.

Credits: See in-game button
